qas.question: What words are likely to have common origins?
Where do Alb and Albus share their origin from?

answers.text: the association of the tops of tall mountains or steep hills with snow.

context: It's likely[weasel words] that <a0_0>alb ("<a2_0>white<a2_0/>") and albus<a0_0/> have common origins deriving from <a1_0>the association of the tops of tall mountains or steep hills with snow.
